promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic epic boar steel-type pokemon with ornate skin. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or boar. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Irontusk, a a dynamic epic boar steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Dangerous Nose, Sing. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "boar", "steel" or "Irontusk". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, boar-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey shadows
generatedDescription: Always found in harsh terrains, this swine of iron amazes with its potent snout, capable of tuneful sounds and lethal charges.
